extendedInfo.description: View your GPS altitude or map elevation on stunning landscapes that adjust according to your local time of day.#1 Altimeter app on iOS is now on Android.  Built-in Flashlight feature makes it perfect for outdoor enthusiasts.View your GPS altitude or map elevation on stunning landscapes that adjust according to your local time of day.A simple and uncluttered interface to read:â¢ Altitude/Elevationâ¢ Latitudeâ¢ LongitudeFeatures:â¢ View altitude/elevation in feet or metersâ¢ Built-in flashlightâ¢ Share your altitude/elevation via e-mail or TwitterNote:  Accuracy is subject to device, location, and signal strength.Keywords: latitude, accuracy, feet, longitude, hiking, position, meters, trail, location, ft, current, foot, flashlight, m

reviews.title: Best Yet!!
reviews.comment: After having tried numerous altitude apps, I installed this one with not a lot of hope. Was I surprised!!.  On the gps setting it gave my elevation as 273 ft. WRONG!! I changed the setting to Map Elevation and it gave a reading of 89ft  Spot on according to Google Earth. I moved the cursor on Google earth to the bottom of my garden, where it gave a reading of 92ft. I then walked to the end of my garden and the app also gave a reading of 92ft  I am impressed and can recommend this app to anybody
reviews.author: Paul Hancock

reviews.title: High quality + Easy to read UI
reviews.comment: Great utility app. I use it just as much for position/altitude as I do for the flashlight.
reviews.author: Kristian Kuhn

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Works fantastically! Just what I needed!
reviews.author: Kelsey Hall

reviews.title: Great useful app!
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I needed it to do, and a little extra!

reviews.title: Review for app
reviews.comment: It\'s the best app ever, very accurate and I like the flash light feature the best.

reviews.title: Great for hiking
reviews.comment: I take it with me when hiking to see my elevation. Veey accurate and the flashlight is great in the eveming whdn camping.

reviews.title: So slick
reviews.comment: This app is so good looking. And simply works.  The flashlight is a perfect add on
